ai-patthana24.16:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.16:0.3_0: There are courses for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana24.16:1.1_0: No cause is a condition for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana24.16:1.1_1: No cause is a condition for the sake of purification by lust.
ai-patthana24.16:3.1_0: No cause is a reason for the sake of refuge to the teaching.
ai-patthana24.16:3.1_1: No cause is a reason for attaining the cause,
